high_descs: Turn left move forward, then turn right to go to the small desk.
Pick up the bowl on the small desk.
Look up to view the lamp on the small desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a bowl in the light of a lamp.

high_descs: move forwards to the desk up ahead on the left
grab a clear bowl off of the desk there
look up a bit towards the lamp on top of the desk on the right
turn on the lamp that's on the desk on the right
anns.task_desc: turn on a lamp while holding a bowl

high_descs: Take a large step to your left and then walk to the chair at the left desk.
Pick up the clear bowl that's in front of you.
Look up at the light that's on the desk please.
Turn on the light that's on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a bowl by lamp light.
